amendment.description: Amendment sought to block funds from being used to transfer or authorize the transfer of cluster munitions to Saudi Arabia.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 40 printed in House Report 114-623 to block funds from being used to transfer or authorize the transfer of cluster munitions to Saudi Arabia.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A038) Failed by recorded vote: 204 - 216 (Roll no. 327).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A038) Failed by recorded vote: 204 - 216 (Roll no. 327).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A038) offered by Mr. Conyers.
